name: Avoid having Records without a naming convention (EGL)
description:
This rules searches for all the Record with name not adhering to a pattern. The pattern will be provided as parameter of the rule.
This rule will list out the record name which has the Upper or lower case of parameter valuer not present in the name.
The default parameter value is W.
The parameter value can be changed by user.
output: This report provides the following information: OTHER RECORD full name
rationale: Having the naming conventions make the source code more easy to ready and so to maintain.
remediation: Try to always have the Records complying to the naming convention.
remediationSample:
For parameter value = W and having a record as below, 
record BBBSG_BILGILER type basicRecord 
Because of the the W character is not in the name, this record violates the rule. 

To fix the violation, you have to add W to the record name as 'BBBSGW_BILGILER' for example
sample:
For parameter value = W 
Having a record as below, 
record BBBSG_BILGILER type basicRecord 

In the record name does not contain W character , so this record will be listed in the violation list
alternativeName: Avoid having Records without a naming convention (EGL)

parameters.name: Record Character
parameters.description: Character should not be present in the Record name
